Package src

Class Library

java.lang.Object
src.Library
public class Library extends Object
Represents a library containing books, authors and patrons

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Library()
    Construct a new library with empty lists of books, authors, patrons
